## ‰ªãÁªç

A house born in the 90s, from Youxi, Sanming, Fujian

Sex: Male

Personality: Black belly, low self-esteem, hypocrisy, good old man, schizophrenia? , Late-stage lazy cancer, like to brush up on the sense of existence, lack of love, cowardice and fear of things, cranky thinking, fear of life, social phobia, fear of others saying me secretly

Symptoms: patients with systemic hyperhidrosis, patients with lumbar disc herniation, patients with mild depression

Hobbies: like watching Japanese dramas, climbing mountains, Japanese TV series, anime, permanent station B, visiting Zhihu, night action lovers, like to be in contact with nature, which makes me feel at ease
